mapper.sql: emi.id as img_id,emi.img_type as img_img_type,emi.original_name as img_original_name,emi.material_id as img_material_id,emi.img_url as img_img_url,emi.is_main as img_is_main,emi.img_order as img_img_order,emi.data_status as img_data_status,emi.remark as img_remark,emi.create_time as img_create_time,emi.create_user as img_create_user,emi.update_time as img_update_time,emi.update_user as img_update_user
mapper.select: SELECT material_main.*, FROM ( select ,emm.model_name AS material_model_name from erp_material em LEFT JOIN erp_material_model emm ON em.material_model_id = emm.id where em.id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER} and em.data_status = 1 ) material_main LEFT JOIN erp_material_img emi ON material_main.id = emi.material_id AND emi.data_status = 1

SELECT material_main.*, FROM ( select ,emm.model_name AS material_model_name from erp_material em LEFT JOIN erp_material_model emm ON em.material_model_id = emm.id where em.material_no = #{materialNo, jdbcType=INTEGER} and em.data_status = 1 ) material_main LEFT JOIN erp_material_img emi ON material_main.id = emi.material_id AND emi.data_status = 1

SELECT material_main.*, FROM ( select ,emm.model_name AS material_model_name from erp_material em LEFT JOIN erp_material_model emm ON em.material_model_id = emm.id where em.material_type = #{materialType, jdbcType=INTEGER} and em.material_capacity_value = #{materialCapacityValue, jdbcType=DOUBLE} and em.data_status = 1 ) material_main LEFT JOIN erp_material_img emi ON material_main.id = emi.material_id AND emi.data_status = 1

SELECT material_main.*, FROM ( select
from erp_material em LEFT JOIN erp_material_model emm ON em.material_model_id = emm.id where em.material_type = #{materialType, jdbcType=INTEGER} and em.material_model_id = #{materialModelId, jdbcType=INTEGER} and em.data_status = 1 ) material_main LEFT JOIN erp_material_img emi ON material_main.id = emi.material_id AND emi.data_status = 1

SELECT ,eb.rent_count,eb.material_can_return_count FROM (SELECT eom.material_id,SUM(1) AS rent_count ,SUM(1) + SUM(IFNULL(erom.real_return_material_count,0)) - SUM(IFNULL(erom.return_material_count, 0)) AS material_can_return_count FROM erp_order eo LEFT JOIN erp_order_material eom ON eo.id = eom.order_id AND eom.data_status=1 LEFT JOIN erp_order_material_bulk eomb ON eomb.order_material_id = eom.id AND eomb.data_status=1 LEFT JOIN erp_return_order_material erom ON erom.return_material_id = eom.material_id AND erom.data_status=1 WHERE eo.buyer_customer_id = #{customerId} AND eo.data_status = 1 AND eo.order_status = 4 AND eomb.actual_return_time IS NULL AND eomb.bulk_material_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY eom.material_id) eb LEFT JOIN erp_material em ON eb.material_id = em.id
